General.Name: Nanjing Canatal Data Centre Environmental Tech Co Ltd Class A
General.Description: Nanjing Canatal Data-Centre Environmental Tech Co., Ltd engages in the research and development, and sale of integrated solutions for the computer room environment in China and internationally. The company offers precision air-conditioning equipment and water chillers, micromodules, computer room air conditioners, heat pipe units, temperature units, fluorine pumps, fixed-point air supply products, and compact centralized condensers. Its products are used in data center computer rooms, communication base stations, and other precision environments, such as constant temperature and humidity units. The company serves government departments, as well as communication, finance, Internet, medical care, rail transit, aviation, energy, and other industries. Nanjing Canatal Data-Centre Environmental Tech Co., Ltd was founded in 2003 and is based in Nanjing, China.
